ttp_template:
<group name="addr_mode_interface_ip_netmask">
 IP Address and Netmask:  {{IP | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{NETMASK}} on {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}},
 Address Mode:  {{ADDR_MODE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
IP Address and Netmask:  10.255.5.55 255.255.0.0 on VLAN 255,
 Address Mode:            User specified
textfsm_template:
Value IP (\S+)
Value NETMASK (\S+)
Value INTERFACE (.*)
Value ADDR_MODE (.*)

Start
  ^\s*IP\s+Address\s+and\s+Netmask:.*$$ -> Continue.Record
  ^\s*IP\s+Address\s+and\s+Netmask:\s+${IP}\s+${NETMASK}\s+on\s+${INTERFACE},\s*$$
  ^\s*Address\s+Mode:\s+${ADDR_MODE}\s*$$
  ^\s*$$
  ^. -> Error
